head.title: Metro Briefing | Connecticut: Branford: Critically Wounded Girl Dies

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | Connecticut: Branford: Critically Wounded Girl Dies

body.head.byline: By Paul von Zielbauer (NYT) (Compiled by Anthony Ramirez)

abstract.p: Sara O'Connor, 7, dies from gunshot wound received outside her home in Branford, Conn (S)

block.p: A 7-year-old girl who was found shot inside her home and then underwent emergency surgery has died at Yale-New Haven Hospital, a hospital spokesman said yesterday. On Friday, the girl, Sara O'Connor, was found shot inside her home in the Meadows of Branford condominiums about 7 a.m., the Branford police said. The police were seen removing a gun from a car outside the house, but no arrests have been made and no charges have been filed. The girl died Monday at 9:15 a.m., said a hospital spokesman, Mark D'Antonio.

The girl died Monday at 9:15 a.m., said a hospital spokesman, Mark D'Antonio.
